summary: Reanimation has never been this convenient, clean and immersive!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/45759-5-1382945828.jpg[/img]

Reanimation has never been this convenient, clean and immersive! 

This is another mod I have made for my personal use, but have decided to share here. 



WOT IT DOES: 

- Adds a single new lesser power to the game, simply titled \'Reanimate\'. 

- This power can be used as often as you like for no magicka cost and can summon creatures of any level. 

- This is not equipped to your hands, but instead to your voice slot meaning you can be using any other weapon or spell (but not shout) whilst this is equipped. 

- It will reanimate whatever corpse you have your cross-hair over when you activate it. There is no little ball of blue light that flies out and hits it, the corpse is reanimated immediately. 

- It has a huge range, as long as you can see the corpse it can be animated. 

- All perks which alter the vanilla necromancy spells \'Necromancy\', \'Twin Souls\' etc. will also affect this power. 

- Also when the reanimation wears off, the corpse will not disintegrate. This means you can get multiple uses out of the same corpse. 



Where can it be found? At Hamvir\'s Rest, the last image shows you its exact location. You are looking for a conjuration tome. 



If someone would like to make a video showcasing this mod in action I would greatly appreciate it! :D
author: TheGreyLight
